summary: The BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria, but the diff implements multiple new features (backend inquiry submission logic and extensive frontend/footer/social/contact-related functionality).

hallucinated_features.description: Added backend inquiry submission endpoint (submitInquiry) with validation and timestamp storage.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented/expanded footer UI including logo, quick links, contact details, and premium-styled Facebook/Instagram social buttons.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/declared broad frontend functionality (routing/pages, layout/header, sticky WhatsApp button, contact form integration, SEO utilities, Google Map embed, styling/theme updates).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest; these changes go beyond any stated request.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking metadata indicating a new feature request (footer social media buttons).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest itself lists no requirements; this metadata represents additional scope not present in the request.
